document_data.name: Crema Athkatla
document_data.mainbody: '''Crema Athkatla''' was a sweet [[custard]], and one of the few desserts in [[Chult]]an cuisine. It was a remnant of the [[Amn]]ian occupation of parts of Chult.
document_data.Description: Crema Athkatla was [[caramel]] in color, and was served in bowls. One bowl was worth 5 [[silver piece]]s in [[Port Nyanzaru]] near the end of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
